blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

summary: Greet the day
title: Greet the day
body:
read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ovuQmI

by winstonlives

Dan is having a bit of a rough time for a few days. Phil tries to help him navigate his mental health issues as best he can. He’s ever supportive and he and Dan work through while on tour where Dan isn’t feeling the best. They both know it will probably always be this way, but they also know they can work together to make it better no matter what.

Words: 3180, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

Series: Part 17 of II tour fics

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Dan Howell & Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Mental Health Issues, Tour Fic, Fluff and Hurt/Comfort, self-care, Good Boyfriend Phil Lester, Implied Sexual Content, Established Relationship, mentions of doctors and meds, Yoga, Love, Friendship/Love, Best Friends, Happy Ending


read it on the AO3 at https://ift.tt/2ovuQmI

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong...
body: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong and dates/locations are gonna fall through. And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

reblog.comment: I’m late to this drama but friendly reminder that planning a world tour ain’t fucken easy and sometimes shit is gonna go wrong and dates/locations are gonna fall through. And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

And not always at perfect convenient times. It happens. The merging of the 12th and 13th shows isn’t the end of the world. If the TBC dates can’t get worked out, it won’t be the end of the world. Not everything works out. That’s just how life is. And I’m sure Dan and Phil are working hard to get everything sorted and keep people updated as best they can.

blog.name: phanfictioncatalogue
blog.title: phanfiction catalogue
blog.description:
mobile users, click here!

please refer to our FAQ first.

Our goal is to create an alphabetized library of every phanfiction in the phandom. Besides that, we compile masterlists of different genres that are scheduled for posting every few days, and help find fics that have been mislocated.

summary: Mey’s Monthly Memorables
title: Mey’s Monthly Memorables
body:
Admin recs of August, 2018.

Rose

bared borders, bottomless (ao3) - keeplovinanyway

Summary: It’s 2014. She’s a therapist. Her client is Mr. Howell, who has steered relatively clear of who he shares his life with. Today, he talks about Phil (a bit).

High Tide (ao3) - bluebones

Summary: Spending three months in the tiny, aging seaside town of Quayside is not how Phil had imagined the holidays of his seventeenth year. As the warm, sticky heat of summer tightens its grip on the coast, the novelty of the beach quickly wears off, and the only distractions he’s left with are the equally bored residents of the village.

Then, one evening, Dan Howell jumps off a cliff and into Phil’s life. He’s a veritable force of nature, as wondrous as he is unpredictable, and against his better judgement Phil quickly becomes enchanted with him. Suddenly, the finite period of time he has in Quayside seems far too short.

let our bodies make memories (ao3) - symmetricdnp

Summary: The tour’s starting to kick into gear, and Dan and Phil enjoy one of their precious days off at home.

tell me why (my gods look like you) (ao3) - queerofcups

Summary: I will keep on waiting for your love.

your hand in my hand (ao3) - CapriciousCrab

Summary: Sometimes the most obvious changes are the most difficult to discuss.

Mae

Lollipop (ao3) - bokeae

Summary: In where Dan’s bisexual and slutty as fuck and Phil just wants his candy business to take off.

I don’t blame you much (for wanting to be free) (ao3) - The_Blonde

Summary: Phil first saw Dan, in a tiny museum in Manchester, wearing a nametag that said Dylan, cleaning one tiny patch of floor over and over, fringe falling in his eyes, staring at The Sea at Saintes-Maries like it was the best thing he had ever seen, like he was looking at something behind it, something hidden. Phil had said “hey, that’s my favourite too. Everyone always walks straight past it” and Dan had jumped like a startled cat and then instantly scurried off. Phil had thought no wait stay. And Dan hadn’t, obviously.

staged like an open house (ao3) - imnotinclinedtomaturity

Summary: Dan and Phil are relieved to have a night in a hotel after several nights on the bus. Phil is ready to relax in bed with his boyfriend, but Dan is determined to film first. The only problem is, they accidentally get a room with only one bed.

isn’t is lovely, all alone (ao3) - ColorMeHazelnut

Summary: “Share?” Phil replies, his voice climbing up higher. “Just one night?” Dan interrupts, he gives Phil a look and Phil merely bits his lips and looks away, his mouth falling a flat line. Or everyone’s favourite trope: bed sharing/there is only one bed.

Love Songs For Robots - dantiloquent

Summary: phil is aromantic and asexual, and dan doesn’t know exactly what that means to start with, but he learns, and it’s okay, they’re okay, of course they’re okay. because asexuality and aromanticism isn’t always grief and loneliness.

Tori

Out of the Ordinary - wishicouldunreadthat

Summary: 2015!Phil ends up with 2012!Dan in his own time. Problem is, this Dan has just experienced the V-day Video incident, so Phil has to live through the arguments all over again.

Prom Plague - rosaflagephil

Summary: Dan has the plague. Well, not literally, but he’s sick so he’s bound to be overdramatic. But a little fever and stomachache isn’t going to stop him from going to prom. He’s got a date (that he doesn’t even like) who he can’t let down and a rumor has it that he’s been voted prom king. Too bad his body has different ideas and decides to humiliate him in front of everyone. At least there’s Phil, the actual angel in the hell called secondary school.

Summary: Dan and Phil are relieved to have a night in a hotel after several nights on the bus. Phil is ready to relax in bed with his boyfriend, but Dan is determined to film first. The only problem is, they accidentally get a room with only one bed.

isn’t is lovely, all alone (ao3) - ColorMeHazelnut

Summary: “Share?” Phil replies, his voice climbing up higher. “Just one night?” Dan interrupts, he gives Phil a look and Phil merely bits his lips and looks away, his mouth falling a flat line. Or everyone’s favourite trope: bed sharing/there is only one bed.

Love Songs For Robots - dantiloquent

Summary: phil is aromantic and asexual, and dan doesn’t know exactly what that means to start with, but he learns, and it’s okay, they’re okay, of course they’re okay. because asexuality and aromanticism isn’t always grief and loneliness.

Tori

Out of the Ordinary - wishicouldunreadthat

Summary: 2015!Phil ends up with 2012!Dan in his own time. Problem is, this Dan has just experienced the V-day Video incident, so Phil has to live through the arguments all over again.

Prom Plague - rosaflagephil

Summary: Dan has the plague. Well, not literally, but he’s sick so he’s bound to be overdramatic. But a little fever and stomachache isn’t going to stop him from going to prom. He’s got a date (that he doesn’t even like) who he can’t let down and a rumor has it that he’s been voted prom king. Too bad his body has different ideas and decides to humiliate him in front of everyone. At least there’s Phil, the actual angel in the hell called secondary school.
trail.content:
Admin recs of August, 2018.

Rose

bared borders, bottomless (ao3) - keeplovinanyway

Summary: It’s 2014. She’s a therapist. Her client is Mr. Howell, who has steered relatively clear of who he shares his life with. Today, he talks about Phil (a bit).

High Tide (ao3) - bluebones

Summary: Spending three months in the tiny, aging seaside town of Quayside is not how Phil had imagined the holidays of his seventeenth year. As the warm, sticky heat of summer tightens its grip on the coast, the novelty of the beach quickly wears off, and the only distractions he’s left with are the equally bored residents of the village.

Then, one evening, Dan Howell jumps off a cliff and into Phil’s life. He’s a veritable force of nature, as wondrous as he is unpredictable, and against his better judgement Phil quickly becomes enchanted with him. Suddenly, the finite period of time he has in Quayside seems far too short.

let our bodies make memories (ao3) - symmetricdnp

Summary: The tour’s starting to kick into gear, and Dan and Phil enjoy one of their precious days off at home.

tell me why (my gods look like you) (ao3) - queerofcups

Summary: I will keep on waiting for your love.

your hand in my hand (ao3) - CapriciousCrab

Summary: Sometimes the most obvious changes are the most difficult to discuss.

Mae

Lollipop (ao3) - bokeae

Summary: In where Dan’s bisexual and slutty as fuck and Phil just wants his candy business to take off.

I don’t blame you much (for wanting to be free) (ao3) - The_Blonde

Summary: Phil first saw Dan, in a tiny museum in Manchester, wearing a nametag that said Dylan, cleaning one tiny patch of floor over and over, fringe falling in his eyes, staring at The Sea at Saintes-Maries like it was the best thing he had ever seen, like he was looking at something behind it, something hidden. Phil had said “hey, that’s my favourite too. Everyone always walks straight past it” and Dan had jumped like a startled cat and then instantly scurried off. Phil had thought no wait stay. And Dan hadn’t, obviously.

staged like an open house (ao3) - imnotinclinedtomaturity

Summary: Dan and Phil are relieved to have a night in a hotel after several nights on the bus. Phil is ready to relax in bed with his boyfriend, but Dan is determined to film first. The only problem is, they accidentally get a room with only one bed.

isn’t is lovely, all alone (ao3) - ColorMeHazelnut

Summary: “Share?” Phil replies, his voice climbing up higher. “Just one night?” Dan interrupts, he gives Phil a look and Phil merely bits his lips and looks away, his mouth falling a flat line. Or everyone’s favourite trope: bed sharing/there is only one bed.

Love Songs For Robots - dantiloquent

Summary: phil is aromantic and asexual, and dan doesn’t know exactly what that means to start with, but he learns, and it’s okay, they’re okay, of course they’re okay. because asexuality and aromanticism isn’t always grief and loneliness.

Tori

Out of the Ordinary - wishicouldunreadthat

Summary: 2015!Phil ends up with 2012!Dan in his own time. Problem is, this Dan has just experienced the V-day Video incident, so Phil has to live through the arguments all over again.

Prom Plague - rosaflagephil

Summary: Dan has the plague. Well, not literally, but he’s sick so he’s bound to be overdramatic. But a little fever and stomachache isn’t going to stop him from going to prom. He’s got a date (that he doesn’t even like) who he can’t let down and a rumor has it that he’s been voted prom king. Too bad his body has different ideas and decides to humiliate him in front of everyone. At least there’s Phil, the actual angel in the hell called secondary school.

!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)
